page.title: 10CLINT, BURNT YATES ROBBERY
page.content: On Saturday, 8th June, 1985 around tea-time, two boys aged about eight or nine broke into the school. They entered by breaking a window, but took nothing of value or caused any damage inside the school. The boys, who attended a special school at Boston Spa, been on a day trip to Brimham Rocks and had run away. To get to Burnt Yates they stole two bicycles. They were caught by a man who thought they were acting suspiciously. When he had caught them he locked them in his shed. Then he telephoned the police. The two boys both have long police records. Every police station in Harrogate knows them. They will appear in court and be prosecuted. Then they will go back to Boston Spa.
